H0.text: when did the united kingdom entered world war 2. 1940

H1.text: when did the united kingdom entered world war 2. 1941

H2.text: when did the united kingdom entered world war 2. 1938

H3.text: when did the united kingdom entered world war 2. 1939

A4.text: The United Kingdom and France declared war on Nazi Germany on 3 September 1939 in response to the invasion of Poland.

A5.text: The UK's Dominions, Crown colonies and protectorates followed the declaration of war by the UK and France on Nazi Germany in response to the invasion of Poland.
